title: Kettle And Lid On Stand With Lamp And Lid, 1711–12
markings: Marks include: Britannia, "7 A", date letter "Q", leopard's head erased
dimensions: H x W x D (a/e: overall): 36 x 26 x 21 cm (14 3/16 x 10 1/4 x 8 1/4 in.)
description: (a) Bulbous body with molded neck, paneled covered spout and pivoting-shaped handle with turned wood centerpiece. Side engraved with scrolled arms. (b) Molded cover with wood knob; (c) stand on three baluster legs on square plinth with large ring for kettle, smaller for lamp; (d) cylindrical lamp with (e), cover with inner spout and hinged top to cover it.

type.name: Kettle and lid on stand with lamp and lid

tombstone.epitaph:
Kettle And Lid On Stand With Lamp And Lid, 1711–12.
1711–12. Silver, wood. Gift of Irwin Untermyer. 1957-11-1-a/e.
